titles.title: A bill to modify requirements for certain employment activities by former intelligence officers and employees of the intelligence community, and for other purposes.
A bill to modify requirements for certain employment activities by former intelligence officers and employees of the intelligence community, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Select Committee on Intelligence.

bill.summary: This bill permanently prohibits certain federal employees in the intelligence community, after their federal employment, from taking positions serving specified foreign countries.
